description: The hilarious video was captured by the Waseda Waterski Team and the unfortunate member of the squad identified as Miroku posted it online after the painful incident on the Tone River in Japan.
title: Unlucky water skier hit in the groin by a leaping fish
title_page: Unlucky water skier hit in the groin by a leaping fish | Daily Mail Online
text:
A wave of pain washed over this unlucky water skier after a fish leapt from the water and smashed him in the groin.
The hilarious video was captured by the Waseda Waterski Team and the unfortunate member of the squad identified as Miroku posted it online.
As he slides through the water's surface on the Tone River in the Kant≈ç region of Japan, a fish appears from nowhere and clatters into his nether regions.
Scroll down for video
The water skier, who has been identified as Miroku, about to be hit in the privates by the fish
As he glides through the water, the Waseda Waterski Team member has no idea what is about to happen
The fish catches him right in the nether regions and as he doubles over in pain he lets go of the towrope
The man's pain is evident and as he doubles over he is forced to let go of the towrope and collapses into the water.
After posting his misery online, the tweet garnered tens of thousands of likes and comments.
Almost all of the replies carried the same message - sympathy for the victim, but an appreciation for sharing the hilarious accident.
